Reorder SETS_WITH_DRAFT_SIGNPOSTS by release date

Reorganized the SETS_WITH_DRAFT_SIGNPOSTS array to be sorted by release date (newest first) to match the display order in the dropdown. This makes it easier to:
- See which sets are newest when looking at the constant
- Add new sets at the top when they''re released
- Understand the display order without running the app

Same 83 sets, just reordered. Unreleased sets are still included and will be filtered by the API''s release date check.
